content: a simple chicken from stardew valley hooks and yarn are merely a suggestion-- find whatever gives a nice tight fabric that doesn t allow polyfill leak out you can also make a pouch and fill it with poly beads and put that in the base of the chicken before filling it gives the chicken a *very* satisfying heft with the bernat blanket yarn one chicken is about 100g if you re lucky you can get about three chickens from 1 skein ultimately this a basically a basket that is seamed but many people asked for the pattern so here it is this is my first pattern i ve drafted so if you find issues please feel free to message me and i ll try to update/fix it as best i can
